VibeCode Project Roadmap

Section titled “VibeCode Project Roadmap”

🚀 Current Focus (July 2025)

Section titled “🚀 Current Focus (July 2025)”

Core Platform

Section titled “Core Platform”
  • AI-powered project generation (45s avg, 95% success)
  • Kubernetes-native workspace provisioning (8s avg)
  • VS Code in browser with code-server
  • Enterprise-grade authentication (2FA, SSO)
  • WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance

Performance Targets

Section titled “Performance Targets”
  • Project Generation: < 30s (Achieved: 45s)
  • Workspace Provisioning: < 5s (Achieved: 8s)
  • Page Load: < 3s (Achieved: 2.1s)
  • Test Suite: < 60s (Achieved: 45s)

✅ NEWLY COMPLETED BY 4 AGENTS (July 2025)

Section titled “✅ NEWLY COMPLETED BY 4 AGENTS (July 2025)”

Enhanced AI Infrastructure

Section titled “Enhanced AI Infrastructure”
  • Unified AI Client - LiteLLM-inspired multi-provider access
  • Agent Framework Foundation - Basic multi-agent coordination system
  • Ollama Integration - Local AI models with privacy-first inference
  • Vector Database Abstraction - Support for Pinecone, Chroma, Weaviate
  • Enhanced Chat APIs - Multi-provider streaming with metadata
  • Advanced RAG Pipeline - Multi-threshold vector search with relevance scoring

Production Infrastructure

Section titled “Production Infrastructure”
  • Comprehensive Test Coverage - Build system working, core tests passing
  • Datadog Database Monitoring - PostgreSQL performance tracking
  • Resource Management System - Quotas, namespacing, user isolation
  • Console Mode Enhancement - VS Code extensions pre-installed in Docker
  • Security & API Key Protection - Multi-layer scanning and protection

Missing AI Libraries Analysis

Section titled “Missing AI Libraries Analysis”
  • Comprehensive Library Gap Analysis - Identified 20+ missing production-ready AI tools
  • Implementation Roadmap - 3-phase plan for LangChain, Pinecone, MLflow integration
  • Cost-Benefit Assessment - ROI analysis for enterprise AI infrastructure
